common.tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Please try again later.

header.requests: Your notifications: pending approvals and memes that need changes.
header.submit: Submit a meme to your channel (upload or import).
header.balance: Your coin balance. You can earn coins via the channel reward.
header.loginRequired: Log in to submit memes and use favorites.
header.loginToUseWallet: Log in to earn coins and activate memes.

submit.filterByUser: Show only submissions from this user.

submitModal.modeUpload: Upload a video file from your device.
submitModal.modeImport: Import by pasting a direct Memealerts media link.
submitModal.openPool: Open the Pool to choose a ready meme instead of uploading.
submitModal.title: Name of the meme in the channel. Viewers will see this title.
submitModal.file: Choose a video file to upload. Supported: common video formats.
submitModal.url: Paste a direct link to the media file from Memealerts (cdns.memealerts.com).
submitModal.tags: Add a few tags to help search and moderation (optional).
submitModal.submit: Send the meme for review. If this is your own channel, it will be added instantly.

memes.search: Search your memes by title, id, etc.
memes.sort: Choose how to sort the list.
memes.searchScope: Choose what fields the search uses.
memes.open: Open meme details. Here you can edit or delete it.

search.query: Search by title, tags, uploader, etc. Results update automatically.
search.minPrice: Show memes that cost at least this many coins.
search.maxPrice: Show memes that cost no more than this many coins.
search.sortBy: Choose how to sort the search results.
search.sortOrder: Ascending = from low to high / old to new. Descending = opposite.
search.tags: Click tags to filter results. Click again to remove.
search.openChannel: Open the channel where this meme belongs.

moderation.search: Search by asset id or file hash.

status.hidden: Hidden in pool (not visible to users).
status.quarantine: In quarantine (blocked from re-upload; pending purge).

moderation.refresh: Reload the list from the server.
moderation.reset: Clear search and reset status filter.
moderation.backToTop: Scroll to the top of the page.
moderation.hide: Hide from the pool (can be undone).
moderation.unhide: Make visible in the pool again.
moderation.quarantine: Move to quarantine: blocks re-upload of this file. Requires a reason.
moderation.reason: Write a short reason (it is required). Example: duplicate / DMCA / reupload.

pool.search: Search in the global meme pool (by text, id, etc.).
pool.runSearch: Run search with the current query.
pool.signIn: Sign in to view the pool and submit memes.
pool.openPreview: Open preview. From there you can submit this meme.
pool.loadMore: Load more memes from the pool.
pool.previewSound: Toggle preview sound. This is saved in your browser.
pool.add: Submit this meme. You will be asked to enter a title for your channel.

profile.submitMeme: Submit a meme to this channel.
profile.loginToInteract: Log in to submit memes and use favorites.

rewards.enableTwitchReward: Turn the Twitch reward on/off (it gives coins to viewers).
rewards.onlyWhenLive: If enabled, it works only when your stream is live.
rewards.enableApprovedReward: Give coins to the viewer when you approve their meme. Turn off = set both rewards to 0.
rewards.approvedOnlyWhenLive: If enabled, coins are granted only when your stream is live.
rewards.approvedUploadCoins: Coins for approved submissions from upload/URL. Use 0 to disable.
rewards.approvedPoolCoins: Coins for approved submissions from the Pool. Use 0 to disable.
rewards.onlyWhenLiveKick: If enabled, Kick rewards grant coins only when live.

bot.enable: Turn the bot on/off for this channel. When on, it can respond in chat.
bot.override: Use your own bot account instead of the default one. Turning it on will redirect you to connect.
bot.commandsMaster: Master switch for all bot commands. Turn off to silence all commands at once.
bot.sendTestMessage: Send a message from the bot to chat to check that it works.

obs.rotateLink: Generate a new overlay link. Use this if the link was leaked — the old one will stop working.
obs.previewNext: Load a new random meme for preview (does not affect your real overlay).
obs.previewLoop: Loop preview: when on, the same preview memes repeat.
obs.previewShufflePositions: Shuffle positions in preview (useful to test layout).
obs.previewBackground: Switch preview background (dark/white) to see how it looks in OBS.
obs.resetDefaults: Reset all overlay appearance settings back to defaults.
obs.presetApply: Apply this saved preset to your overlay settings.

moderation.title: Pool moderation
moderation.hint: Moderators can only hide/unhide or move items to quarantine. Title/tags cannot be edited here.
moderation.noAccessHint: You do not have permission to moderate the global pool.
moderation.loginRequiredHint: Please sign in to access moderation tools.
moderation.reasonTooShort: Reason must be at least 3 characters.
moderation.hideTooltip: Hide from the public pool list. The file is not deleted — you can unhide it later.
moderation.quarantineTooltip: Quarantine = soft-delete: it disappears from the pool and re-uploading the same file is blocked. It is not purged immediately. Reason is required.
moderation.hideConfirm: Hide this item from the pool?
moderation.unhideConfirm: Make this item visible in the pool?
moderation.quarantineHint: This will move the asset into quarantine (not immediately purged). Re-uploading the same file will be blocked. Reason is required.
moderation.reasonPlaceholder: Describe why this should be deleted…

statusTooltip.hidden: Only hidden items (not visible in the pool).
statusTooltip.all: All statuses: visible + hidden + quarantine + purged.

ownerModeration.memeAssetsHint: Review hidden/quarantine/purged assets and restore if needed.
ownerModeration.restoreConfirm: Restore this meme asset back to visible state?

ownerTagModeration.title: Owner: Tag suggestions
ownerTagModeration.hint: Review auto-tag suggestions and map them to canonical tags.
ownerTagModeration.mapMissingTag: Enter a tag name to map.

ownerModerators.title: Owner: Moderators
ownerModerators.grantConfirm: Grant moderator access for this user?
ownerModerators.revokeConfirm: Revoke moderator access for this user?
ownerModerators.sessionHint: If you granted rights to yourself, refresh the page (or relog) to update access.

settings.accountsHint: Connect services to sign in and enable integrations.
settings.accountsServiceTwitchHint: Used to sign in and enable Twitch-only features.
settings.accountsServiceVkvideoHint: Used for VK Video Live integrations.
settings.accountsCannotUnlinkLast: You can't unlink the last linked account.
settings.accountsNotFound: Account not found or doesn't belong to you.
settings.noLinkedAccountsHint: Link at least one account to avoid losing access.

auth.loginRequired: Please log in to use this feature.
auth.loginToInteract: Log in to submit memes and use favorites
auth.loginToUseWallet: Log in to earn coins and activate memes
auth.chooseModeTitle: Where do you want to go?
auth.chooseModeHint: You can switch later from the avatar menu. We will remember your choice on this device.
auth.modeStreamerHint: Approve submissions, manage bots and settings.
auth.modeViewerHint: Open a public profile to browse and submit memes.

modal.title: Login required
modal.description: Log in with Twitch to use this feature.

auth.accountAlreadyLinked: This Twitch account is already linked to another user.

landing.title: Channel Points Mem Alerts
landing.subtitle: Spend your Twitch channel points to activate memes on stream!
landing.terms: By continuing, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
landing.viewerStep3: Activate the reward on Twitch to get coins

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Manage your memes and channel settings

cards.submit: Add a new meme to your channel.
cards.mySubmissions: Open submissions and see what needs your action.
cards.allMemes: Open your channel meme library and edit existing memes.
cards.settings: Open channel settings: rewards, bots, OBS, and more.
cards.submissionsControl: Control whether viewers can submit memes and generate automation links.

help.resetLayout: Reset the order of dashboard cards back to the default.
help.dragToReorder: Drag this handle to change the order of cards on your dashboard.
help.pendingCount: How many submissions are waiting for approval.
help.needsChanges: Send back to the author to fix and resubmit.
help.refreshMySubmissions: Refresh the list of your submissions (use if the list looks outdated).
help.historyComingSoon: Submission history will appear here later (coming soon).
help.channelTabComingSoon: A dedicated “channel submissions” view will appear here later (coming soon).

dashboard.shareLinkDescription: Share this link so others can submit memes and activate them on your channel!
dashboard.noChannel: You don't have a channel yet. Create one to start using the platform.

quickActions.submitMemeDescription: Add a meme directly to your pool
quickActions.allMemesDescription: Browse and edit your meme library
quickActions.mySubmissionsDescription: Track the submissions you sent to other channels

submissions.enabledHint: If disabled, viewers will see a message instead of the submit form.
submissions.onlyWhenLiveHint: If enabled, submissions will be rejected when the stream is offline.

submissionsControl.title: Submissions
submissionsControl.subtitle: Control whether viewers can submit memes.
submissionsControl.linkHint: Use this link in automation tools to control submissions instantly.
submissionsControl.revealOnce: Link is hidden. Rotate to reveal a new one.
submissionsControl.invalidToken: Token is invalid. Rotate the link to generate a new one.
submissionsControl.rotated: Link updated. Paste the new URL into StreamerBot.

bots.title: Bots
bots.subtitle: Enable or disable all bot integrations at once.
bots.youtubeRelinkRequired: YouTube needs re-linking (missing permissions). Open Settings → Bot to reconnect.
bots.failedPartial: Some bots failed to update. Please retry.
bots.hint: Список берётся с сервера. Если YouTube просит re-link — переподключите в Settings → Bot.

bulkUpload.dropHint: Drag and drop or click to select files
bulkUpload.subtitle: Drop up to {{maxFiles}} videos (max {{maxMb}}MB, {{maxSeconds}}s each).
bulkUpload.title: Bulk upload

memeCatalogMode.hint: Выберите, что будет показываться на странице канала: только ваши одобренные мемы или весь пул.

state.poolAll: Сейчас: весь пул (пользователи могут активировать любой мем).

errors.rateLimited: Too many requests. Please wait {{seconds}} seconds.
errors.fileTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum {{maxMb}} MB.
errors.videoTooLong: Video is too long. Maximum 5 minutes.
errors.invalidType: Invalid file type. Upload a video.
errors.unknown: Something went wrong. Please try again.

submit.importSubmitted: Meme import submitted! Waiting for approval.
submit.mySubmissionsSubtitle: Track your submissions and quickly fix the ones that were sent back for changes.
submit.channelSubmissionsHint: Click a user to filter. This is a lightweight view of recent submissions.
submit.noChannelSubmissions: No submissions found for the current filters.
submit.directApproved: Meme was added to your channel.

submissions.messageHint: This will be shown to the submitter.
submissions.needsChangesReasonRequired: Select a reason or write a message.
submissions.resubmitsInfo: User can resubmit up to {{max}} times. Remaining: {{left}}.

admin.botDescription: Enable/disable the chat bot subscription for your channel. The bot joins/leaves chats automatically based on this setting.
admin.featureNotAvailable: Feature not available on this server yet.
admin.vkvideoBotIntegrationHint: First link your VKVideo account in 'Accounts', then enable the bot. If required, paste your VKVideo channel URL.
admin.vkvideoChannelUrlHelp: Required for VKVideo Live DevAPI. Backend will try to resolve it automatically from linked VKVideo account; if it fails, you'll need to paste it.
admin.vkvideoChannelUrlRequired: Paste your VKVideo Live channel URL.
admin.vkvideoChannelUrlModalBody: We couldn't resolve vkvideoChannelUrl automatically. Paste your VKVideo Live channel URL and click “Save”.
admin.vkvideoMigrationHint: VKVideo was enabled before the update and vkvideoChannelUrl might be missing. Disable → enable VKVideo so the server can store the channel URL.
admin.vkvideoCandidatesHint: Before enabling, we'll try to find your VKVideo channels automatically.
admin.vkvideoNotLinked: VKVideo account is not linked. Link VKVideo in Settings → Accounts.
admin.vkvideoMultipleCandidates: Multiple VKVideo channels found. Pick one and click “Enable”.
admin.vkvideoCandidatesPickHint: Candidates were found. Select channel URL and click “Enable”.
admin.vkvideoChannelIdHelp: Used only when enabling VKVideo bot.
admin.botOutboxBotNotJoined: The bot runner hasn't joined the chat yet (not joined) or isn't running. Please wait and try again later.
admin.botOutboxPendingLong: Waiting for delivery by the bot… If it stays pending for long, send the Outbox ID to support.
admin.vkvideoRunnerCheckHint: If the status doesn't change for a long time, check that the VKVideo bot runner is running on the server.
admin.youtubeRelinkRequiredNotice: You need to relink YouTube (missing permissions or token expired). Click “Relink”.
admin.youtubeRelinkWillRetry: After relinking, we'll try enabling automatically.
admin.youtubeChannelRequired: Your account doesn't have a YouTube channel. Create/activate a channel and try again.
admin.youtubeApiNotConfigured: YouTube Data API is not configured on the server. Please contact support.
admin.youtubeApiQuota: YouTube API quota is exceeded. Please try again later.
admin.youtubeEnablePreconditionFailed: Failed to enable YouTube bot (precondition failed).
admin.twitchChannelNotLinked: This channel is not linked to Twitch.
admin.botToggleHint: When enabled, the runner will join your chat and can send messages.
admin.botStatusUnknown: Status is unknown until you toggle it (or until the server provides it).
admin.botMenusDisabledHint: Enable the bot to access its settings.
admin.botCommandsHint: Create a trigger word and the bot reply. When someone sends the trigger in chat, the bot will respond.
admin.botCommandsNotAvailable: Commands are not available on this server yet. Please deploy the backend update.
admin.botCommandsMasterHint: Turns all commands on/off. Individual command settings are preserved.
admin.botCommandsDisabledHint: Enable commands to manage triggers and replies.
admin.botCommandsOnlyWhenLiveTitle: Active only when stream is live
admin.botCommandsOnlyWhenLiveHint: If enabled, all bot commands reply only while your stream is online.
admin.botCommandAudienceHint: Choose roles and/or specific users. Leave empty to allow everyone.
admin.botTestMessageHint: Send a message from the bot into your Twitch chat. This helps confirm the bot is connected and visible.
admin.followGreetingsHint: When someone follows your channel (while you are live), the bot will post a greeting in chat.
admin.rewardOnlyWhenLiveTitle: Active only when stream is live
admin.rewardOnlyWhenLiveHint: When enabled, the reward works only while your stream is online.
admin.streamDurationHint: Bot command that tracks how long your stream has been live. Optional “break credit” keeps the timer running during short interruptions.
admin.streamDurationNotAvailable: Stream duration command is not available on this server yet. Please deploy the backend update.
admin.streamDurationLiveOnlyInfo: This command works only while your Twitch stream is live.
admin.streamDurationBreakCreditHint: If the stream goes offline briefly (e.g. 30 min) and credit is 60 min, the timer won’t reset.
admin.botCommandOnlyWhenLiveTitle: Active only when stream is live
admin.botCommandOnlyWhenLiveHint: If enabled, this command replies only while your stream is online.
admin.obsLinksDescription: Copy the overlay link and paste it into OBS as a Browser Source. The overlay will show activated memes in real time.
admin.obsOverlayUrlHint: Click to copy. You can reveal the URL with the eye icon.
admin.obsOverlayRotateLinkHint: Use this if your overlay URL was leaked. The old link will stop working.
admin.obsOverlayTokenRotated: Overlay link updated. Paste the new URL into OBS.
admin.obsOverlayModeQueueHint: Shows one meme at a time.
admin.obsOverlayModeUnlimitedHint: Shows all incoming memes at once (no limit).
admin.obsOverlayShowSenderHint: Name is provided by the server (not the client).
admin.obsOverlayMaxConcurrentHint: Safety limit for unlimited mode (prevents OBS from lagging).
admin.obsOverlayAdvancedHintShort: Customize the look here — then just paste the main overlay URL into OBS.
admin.obsOverlayAnimEasingHint: Controls the feel of enter/exit. iOS is the recommended default.
admin.obsOverlayAnimSpeedHint: Slower looks more premium; faster feels snappier.
admin.obsOverlayBorderPresetHint: Presets override the visual style of the frame (still uses your thickness/radius).
admin.obsOverlaySenderBgRadiusHint: Tip: try 8–16 for a modern rounded rectangle.
admin.obsOverlaySenderStrokeHint: Glass uses automatic highlights; Solid uses your color.
admin.obsOverlayLivePreviewHint: Preview uses a real random meme when available. Copy the URL above into OBS when ready.
admin.obsPreviewBackgroundImageHint: Preview-only. Paste an image URL (for example your Twitch banner URL) to check readability.
admin.creditsGoogleFontsHint: Google Fonts are loaded automatically in the overlay (no file uploads).
admin.obsPresetsHint: Start from a preset, then tweak below.
admin.obsCustomPresetsEmpty: Save your first preset to reuse it later.
admin.obsGlassEnabledHint: Can look great, but may cost performance in OBS.
admin.obsPerformanceModeHint: Disables blur/glass and reduces heavy effects to keep OBS smooth.
admin.obsOverlaySafeAreaHint: Keeps memes away from the edges to avoid clipping.
admin.overlayDefaultsApplied: Settings reset to defaults (don’t forget to click “Save”)
admin.overlayShareExportHint: Copy the code and send it to someone else. This is not a secret—just visual settings.
admin.twitchRewardNotAvailable: This Twitch reward is available only for affiliate/partner channels.
admin.twitchEligibilityUnknown: We couldn't verify Twitch eligibility right now. You can try enabling the reward; if it fails, log out and log in again.
admin.rewardCostCoinsRequired: Reward cost and coins are required.
admin.obsHowToStep3: Set Width/Height (e.g. 1920×1080) and enable “Shutdown source when not visible” if you want.
admin.title: Settings
admin.autoRewardsSharedConfigHint: Shared config: applies where the backend supports the event (Twitch/Kick/Trovo/VKVideo).
admin.autoRewardsAllDisabled: All auto rewards are currently disabled. Enable the events you want below.
admin.autoRewardsChatThresholdsHint: coinsByThreshold: threshold → coins. (Thresholds array is derived from the keys.)
admin.twitchCoinsRewardDescription: Viewers spend Twitch Channel Points and receive coins on the site.
admin.twitchChannelPointsMappingDescription: Twitch-only mapping. Stored inside the auto-rewards JSON.
admin.kickCoinsRewardDescription: Viewers redeem a reward on Kick and receive coins on the site.
admin.kickRewardsPrereqHint: Important: also configure the integration in the Bots tab (kickChannelId), otherwise events cannot be matched to your channel.
admin.kickNotLinked: Kick account is not linked. Link Kick in Settings → Accounts.
admin.kickScopeMissingEventsSubscribe: Kick permission missing: events:subscribe. Re-link Kick with the correct scopes.
admin.kickAccessTokenMissing: Kick access token is missing. Re-link Kick account.
admin.kickRewardOnlyWhenLiveHint: If enabled, coins are granted only when your Kick stream is live.
admin.kickRewardIdHint: If set, coins are granted only for this rewardId.
admin.kickCoinPerPointRatioHint: coins = points * ratio (used when kickRewardCoins is empty).
admin.kickRewardCoinsHint: Fixed coins. If set, it overrides ratio.
admin.trovoCoinsRewardDescription: Grant coins for mana / elixir on Trovo.
admin.trovoRewardsPrereqHint: Important: also configure the integration in the Bots tab (trovoChannelId). Considered “enabled” when per-unit > 0.
admin.trovoNotLinked: Trovo account is not linked. Link Trovo in Settings → Accounts.
admin.invalidTrovoCoinsPerUnit: Please enter valid numbers (0 or greater).
admin.vkvideoCoinsRewardDescription: Viewers redeem a reward on VKVideo and receive coins on the site.
admin.vkvideoRewardsPrereqHint: Important: also configure the integration in the Bots tab (vkvideoChannelId/vkvideoChannelUrl).
admin.vkvideoRewardOnlyWhenLiveHint: If enabled, coins are granted only when your VKVideo stream is live.
admin.vkvideoRewardIdHint: If set, coins are granted only for this rewardId.
admin.vkvideoCoinPerPointRatioHint: coins = points * ratio (used when vkvideoRewardCoins is empty).
admin.vkvideoRewardCoinsHint: Fixed coins. If set, it overrides ratio.
admin.approvedMemeRewardDescription: Granted to the submitter when you approve their meme.
admin.invalidSubmissionRewardCoins: Please enter a valid number (0 or greater)
admin.autoplayMemesDescription: When enabled, meme previews autoplay (muted) on pages with many memes.
admin.rejectWarning: This action cannot be undone. Please provide a reason for rejection.
admin.rejectionReasonDescription: This reason will be visible to the submitter
admin.enableRewardDescription: Create a custom channel point reward that appears in your Twitch chat. Users can redeem channel points to get coins on this site.
admin.rewardCostDescription: How many channel points users need to spend
admin.rewardCoinsDescription: How many coins users will receive
admin.rewardIdDescription: This ID is automatically generated when you enable the reward
admin.colorsVisibleToVisitors: These colors will be visible to visitors on your channel profile page
admin.name: Name
admin.deletePromotion: Are you sure you want to delete this promotion?
admin.requiresReauth: You need to log out and log in again to enable Twitch rewards. This is required to get the necessary permissions.
admin.noGrantedBetaUsers: No users currently have beta access
admin.submissionRewardCoinsDescription: Coins granted to the viewer when you approve their submission. Set 0 to disable.
admin.submissionRewardCoinsDescriptionSplit: Coins granted to the viewer when you approve their submission. Pool and upload/URL can have different rewards. Set 0 to disable.
admin.autoRewardsTwitchOnlyHint: Twitch-only: channel points mapping. Stored in the same auto-rewards JSON.
admin.boostyCoinsPerSubHint: Награда по умолчанию, если tier не сопоставлен (0 = отключить).
admin.boostyRewardsDescription: Настройка наград за подписку Boosty (fallback и таблица tier→coins).
admin.boostyRewardsDisabledWarning: Награды отключены: укажите fallback (boostyCoinsPerSub) или таблицу tier→coins, иначе монеты начисляться не будут.
admin.botTestMessageHintYoutube: Send a message from the bot into your YouTube live chat. This helps confirm the bot is connected.
admin.channelDesignDescription: Настройки внешнего вида и поведения интерфейса на сайте.
admin.confirmRevoke: Отозвать entitlement custom-bot для этого channelId?
admin.ownerEntitlementsHint: Рациональный и безопасный способ: резолвим channelId по Twitch broadcaster_id (externalId) и выдаём entitlement. Ни логинов, ни email здесь нет.
admin.preferencesHint: Небольшие настройки, которые влияют на UX внутри панели.
admin.resolveHint: Grant (by provider) сам резолвит канал и делает upsert entitlement custom_bot.
admin.rewardsDescription: Настройка наград и начисления монет за действия зрителей.
admin.twitchAutoRewardsDescription: Автоматическое начисление монет за события (Twitch/Kick/Trovo/VKVideo). Настройка хранится в виде JSON и применяется бэкендом best-effort.
admin.twitchAutoRewardsHint: Все секции опциональны. Если enabled=false или coins/… = 0 — награда не начисляется. Twitch: channelPoints → byRewardId (reward.id). VKVideo: follow/subscribe/chat используют те же секции (subscribe.primeCoins = coins). Если channelPoints.enabled=false — остаётся legacy-настройка rewardIdForCoins.
admin.walletHint: Tip: choose a viewer and a streamer channel — streamer self-wallets are hidden (unlimited).

profile.forYouEmpty: No picks yet. Try activating a few memes.

coinsInfoModal.title: How to get coins
coinsInfoModal.description: Activate the reward on the streamer's Twitch channel to get coins.
coinsInfoModal.descriptionWithReward: Activate the reward "{{rewardTitle}}" on the streamer's Twitch channel to get coins.
coinsInfoModal.afterActivation: After activation, coins will appear in your balance.

tagInput.pressEnterToAdd: Press Enter, space, or comma to add a tag. Tag is one word. Maximum 50 characters per tag.
tagInput.label: Tags

toast.pleaseLogInToActivate: Please log in to activate memes

betaAccess.title: Beta access required
betaAccess.description: You are logged in, but do not have access to the beta version.
betaAccess.rejected: Your request was rejected. You can submit a new request.
betaAccess.revoked: Your beta access was revoked by an administrator.
betaAccess.useProduction: Please use the production site while you do not have beta access.
betaAccess.pageDescription: Beta is for testing new features. You can request access below.
betaAccess.loginRequired: Please log in to request beta access.
betaAccess.blacklistedDescription: Sorry, you cannot get beta access because you are on the blacklist.

memeModal.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{{title}}"?

subscription.boostyAccessDescription: Статус доступа определяется через Discord roles. Никаких Boosty-токенов больше не нужно.
subscription.boostyAccessNeedDiscordBody: Привяжите Discord, затем мы проверим роли на сервере.
